input.sentences: while we were on vacation we decided to go sight seeing .
then | we went into town and looked at some neat buildings .
we went to the pier and looked through the binocular viewers at the shore .
at the end of the day we piled into our car to go home .
output.sentences: I was on vacation, seeing the sights, and I finally decided where to go.
I was able to use the viewers to get a glimpse of the shore and pier.
At the end of the day, I piled in the car and went home.
